original_text: So they and their sons were in charge of the gates of the house of the Lord, that is, the house of the tent, as guards.
korean_text: 그들과 그들의 자손이 그 순차를 좇아 여호와의 성전 곧 성막 문을 지켰는데

sentences.original_text: So they and their sons were in charge of the gates of the house of the Lord,
sentences.korean_translation: 그래서 그들과 그들의 아들들은 주의 집의 문들을 맡아 지켰으니,

sentences.original_text: that is, the house of the tent,
